name: Monday Night Makin'
description:
Welcome to Monday Night Makin',  a high quality FNF ripoff made in Scratch I made back in November 2021 because of a bet one of my friends gave me. Featuring 4-ish weeks, music (that has no instrumentals unfortunately), 6 key, and whatever else you can think of. There are other games in the series which can be found here.

Controls: Arrow keys to move around menus, SPACE to select, and Z to return/go back. Default key binds are DFJK and SDFJKL.
